overview: The poets would say: “Each favela is a universe in crisis”. And with Toni it is no different. In Ashes, he lives another day of routine: crowded buses, delayed wages, demanding punctuality at work, disbelief in studies, lack of money, police and psychological crisis. The anguish of this young man is similar to that of so many other real-life characters. Ashes, a film by Larissa Fulana de Tal, inspired by the tale of Davi Nunes.
title: Cinzas
